sentence.value: Johnson was a distinguished graduate of U.S. Air Force Test Pilot School and the U.S. Air Force Academy.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Johnson was a distinguished graduate of U.S. Air Force Test Pilot School and [[the U.S. Air Force Academy|United_States_Air_Force_Academy]].

sentence.value: His military decorations include the Distinguished Flying Cross, Meritorious Service Medal (2), Air Medal (4), Aerial Achievement Medal (3), Air Force Commendation Medal, and the Air Force Achievement Medal (2).
